channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows

item.title: CVE-2023-23487|2024-08-02T10:35:32.192Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to insufficient audit logging. IBM X-Force ID: 245918.

item.title: CVE-2023-27859|2024-08-02T12:23:30.140Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 10.1, 10.5, and 11.1 could allow a remote user to execute arbitrary code caused by installing like named jar files across multiple databases. A user could exploit this by installing a malicious jar file that overwrites the existing like named jar file in another database. IBM X-Force ID: 249205.

item.title: CVE-2023-47141|2024-08-02T21:01:22.657Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IIBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 could allow an authenticated user with CONNECT privileges to cause a denial of service using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 270264.

item.title: CVE-2023-47158|2024-08-02T21:01:22.800Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description:
IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)
10.5, 11.1 and 11.5
could allow an authenticated user with CONNECT privileges to cause a denial of service using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 270750.

item.title: CVE-2023-47152|2024-08-02T21:01:22.735Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to an insecure cryptographic algorithm and to information disclosure in stack trace under exceptional conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 270730.

item.title: CVE-2023-30446|2024-08-02T14:21:44.886Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description:
IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain tables. IBM X-Force ID:
253361
.

item.title: CVE-2023-29255|2024-08-02T14:00:15.989Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as it may trap when compiling a variation of an anonymous block. IBM X-Force ID: 251991.

item.title: CVE-2023-25930|2024-08-02T11:39:05.333Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.1, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service. Under rare conditions, setting a special register may cause the Db2 server to terminate abnormally. IBM X-Force ID: 247862.

item.title: CVE-2023-30448|2024-08-02T14:21:44.840Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain tables. IBM X-Force ID: 253437.

item.title: CVE-2023-30431|2024-08-02T14:21:44.904Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 db2set is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. An attacker could overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code. IBM X-Force ID: 252184.

item.title: CVE-2023-38719|2024-08-02T17:46:56.753Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 11.5 could allow a local user with special privileges to cause a denial of service during database deactivation on DPF. IBM X-Force ID: 261607.

item.title: CVE-2023-40374|2024-08-02T18:31:53.741Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query statement. IBM X-Force ID: 263575.

item.title: CVE-2023-29257|2024-08-02T14:00:16.066Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to remote code execution as a database administrator of one database may execute code or read/write files from another database within the same instance. IBM X-Force ID: 252011.

item.title: CVE-2023-38003|2024-08-02T17:23:27.931Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a user with DATAACCESS privileges to execute routines that they should not have access to. IBM X-Force ID: 260214.

item.title: CVE-2023-30447|2024-08-02T14:21:44.862Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain tables. IBM X-Force ID: 253436.

item.title: CVE-2023-40687|2024-08-02T18:38:51.153Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted RUNSTATS command on an 8TB table. IBM X-Force ID: 264809.

item.title: CVE-2023-35012|2024-08-02T16:17:04.209Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 with a Federated configuration is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local user with SYSADM privileges could overflow the buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 257763.

item.title: CVE-2023-30445|2024-08-02T14:21:44.930Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain tables. IBM X-Force ID: 253357.

item.title: CVE-2023-27559|2024-08-02T12:16:35.843Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when using a specially crafted subquery. IBM X-Force ID: 249196.

item.title: CVE-2023-38740|2024-08-02T17:54:38.450Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX, and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262613.

item.title: CVE-2023-46167|2024-08-02T20:37:39.913Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to a denial of service when a specially crafted cursor is used. IBM X-Force ID: 269367.

item.title: CVE-2023-38728|2024-08-02T17:46:56.689Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted XML query statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262258.

item.title: CVE-2023-27867|2024-08-02T12:23:29.232Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 JDBC Driver for Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code via JNDI Injection. By sending a specially crafted request using the property clientRerouteServerListJNDIName, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 249514.

item.title: CVE-2023-29258|2024-08-02T14:00:15.886Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service through a specially crafted federated query on specific federation objects. IBM X-Force ID: 252048.

item.title: CVE-2023-30991|2024-08-02T14:45:24.674Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 254037.

item.title: CVE-2023-27555|2024-08-02T12:16:35.626Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service when attempting to use ACR client affinity for unfenced DRDA federation wrappers. IBM X-Force ID: 249187.

item.title: CVE-2023-30442|2024-08-02T14:21:44.928Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when using a specially crafted wrapper using certain options. IBM X-Force ID: 253202.

item.title: CVE-2023-40692|2024-08-02T18:38:51.172Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service under extreme stress conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 264807.

item.title: CVE-2023-40372|2024-08-02T18:31:53.682Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement using External Tables. IBM X-Force ID: 263499.

item.title: CVE-2023-45178|2024-08-02T20:14:19.819Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 11.5 CLI is vulnerable to a denial of service when a specially crafted request is used. IBM X-Force ID: 268073.

item.title: CVE-2023-38720|2024-08-02T17:46:56.896Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted ALTER TABLE statement. IBM X-Force ID: 261616.

item.title: CVE-2023-26022|2024-08-02T11:39:06.167Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when an Out of Memory occurs using the DBMS_OUTPUT module. IBM X-Force ID: 247868.

item.title: CVE-2023-38727|2024-08-02T17:46:56.811Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted SQL statement. IBM X-Force ID: 262257.

item.title: CVE-2023-29256|2024-08-02T14:00:16.015Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to an information disclosure due to improper privilege management when certain federation features are used. IBM X-Force ID: 252046.

item.title: CVE-2023-40373|2024-08-02T18:31:53.828Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query containing common table expressions. IBM X-Force ID: 263574.

item.title: CVE-2023-27869|2024-08-02T12:23:30.635Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 JDBC Driver for Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unchecked logger injection. By sending a specially crafted request using the named traceFile property, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 249517.

item.title: CVE-2023-27868|2024-08-02T12:23:30.703Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 JDBC Driver for Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an unchecked class instantiation when providing plugin classes. By sending a specially crafted request using the named pluginClassName class, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 249516.

item.title: CVE-2023-30449|2024-08-02T14:21:44.856Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 253439.

item.title: CVE-2023-30987|2024-08-02T14:45:24.447Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain databases. IBM X-Force ID: 253440.

item.title: CVE-2023-45193|2024-08-02T20:14:19.820Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to a denial of service when a specially crafted cursor is used. IBM X-Force ID: 268759.

item.title: CVE-2023-26021|2024-08-02T11:39:06.632Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when compiling a specially crafted SQL query using a LIMIT clause. IBM X-Force ID: 247864.

item.title: CVE-2024-28762|2024-08-02T00:56:58.142Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.title: CVE-2024-27254|2024-08-02T00:28:00.317Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.title: CVE-2024-25030|2024-07-12T21:01:45.842Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.title: CVE-2023-38729|2024-07-12T21:01:13.640Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.title: CVE-2024-25046|2024-07-12T21:13:55.294Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.title: CVE-2023-29267|2024-06-28T20:10:46.415Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.

item.title: CVE-2024-28762|2024-06-12T19:15:49.462Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 285246.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service by an authenticated user using a specially crafted query. IBM X-Force ID: 282953.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.1 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by a local user. IBM X-Force ID: 281677.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes DB2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 federated server is vulnerable to denial of service with a specially crafted query under certain conditions. IBM X-Force ID: 283813.

item.title: CVE-2024-22360|2024-04-03T12:32:21.341Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service with a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables. IBM X-Force ID: 280905.

item.title: CVE-2023-52296|2024-04-03T12:30:40.180Z -- ibm -- db2%20for%20linux%2C%20unix%20and%20windows
item.description: IBM DB2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 11.5 is vulnerable to denial of service when querying a specific UDF built-in function concurrently. IBM X-Force ID: 278547.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server)10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to sensitive information disclosure when using ADMIN_CMD with IMPORT or EXPORT. IBM X-Force ID: 262259.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5 is vulnerable to a denial of service as the server may crash when using a specially crafted query on certain columnar tables by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287613.

item.description: IBM Db2 for Linux, UNIX and Windows (includes Db2 Connect Server) 10.5, 11.1, and 11.5is vulnerable to a denial of service, under specific configurations, as the server may crash when using a specially crafted SQL statement by an authenticated user. IBM X-Force ID: 287612.
